primitive.name: operational-state
primitive.comments: Unit operational state, in the interval [0,1].

primitive.name: direct-fire-power
primitive.comments: Unit direct-fire power.

primitive.name: indirect-fire-power
primitive.comments: Unit indirect-fire power.

primitive.name: close-combat-power
primitive.comments: Unit close-combat power.

primitive.name: engineering-power
primitive.comments: Unit engineering power.

primitive.name: position
primitive.comments: Unit position.

primitive.name: resources
primitive.comments: Amount of specified resources.

primitive.name: equipments
primitive.comments: Amount of specified equipments into specified states.

primitive.name: humans
primitive.comments: Amount of specified personel into specified states.

primitive.name: maintenance-handling-unit
primitive.comments: Units carrying maintenance operations.

primitive.name: direct-fire-unit
primitive.comments: Units firing direct fires.

primitive.name: fire-component-damage
primitive.comments: Amount of specified equipments damaged by direct fires.

primitive.name: detecting-unit
primitive.comments: Whether a specified unit is detected or not with specified perception level(s).

primitive.name: mounted
primitive.comments: Unit mounted state (0: unmounted, 1: mounted)

primitive.name: distance
primitive.comments: Computes distance between specified positions.

primitive.name: contains
primitive.comments: Tests if area contains specified position.

primitive.name: filter
primitive.comments: Filters provided elements to keep only input matching 'true' filter entries.

primitive.name: is-one-of
primitive.comments: Tests if elements are in list.

primitive.name: derivate
primitive.comments: Computes difference between current and previous value.

primitive.name: integrate
primitive.comments: Computes sum between current and previous value.

primitive.name: domain
primitive.comments: Returns selected value for all elements from domain.

primitive.name: compare
primitive.comments: Returns test result.

primitive.name: compose
primitive.comments: Returns inner join of inputs (values of 'input 1' matching elements from 'input 2').

primitive.name: select
primitive.comments: Returns input value for selected element.

primitive.name: count
primitive.comments: Returns number of elements in list.

primitive.name: minimum
primitive.comments: Returns minimum value from list.

primitive.name: maximum
primitive.comments: Returns maximum value from list.

primitive.name: sum
primitive.comments: Returns the sum of values in list.

primitive.name: mean
primitive.comments: Returns the mean of values in list (sum / count).

primitive.name: threshold
primitive.comments: Returns the value from 'values' matching the threshold which input value is below.

primitive.name: product
primitive.comments: Returns the product of parameters.

primitive.name: indicator
primitive.comments: Use the formula as a named indicator.

primitive.name: plot
primitive.comments: Plots the formula value as a graph.
